member.name: M:Watson.Web.Controllers.v1.ChatController.CreateChat(Watson.Application.Features.Chat.Commands.CreateChatSessionCommand)
member.summary: Create a new chat session and populate it with the initial bot message.
member.param: The necessary information to create a chat
member.returns: Returns the new unique ID for the created chat session

member.name: M:Watson.Web.Controllers.v1.ChatController.SendMessage(Watson.Application.Features.Chat.Commands.SendChatMessageCommand)
member.summary: Send a new chat message in an existing session and get a response.
member.param: The necessary infromation to send a chat message in a session.
member.returns: Returns the response from the generative model

member.name: M:Watson.Web.Controllers.v1.NoteController.CreateNote(Watson.Core.Entities.Note)
member.summary: Add a new note to a Crime Scene
member.param: A note object containing all information to a note
member.returns: The GUID of the newly created Note

member.name: M:Watson.Web.Controllers.v1.NoteController.UpdateNote(Watson.Core.Entities.Note)
member.summary: Update an existing Note within a Crime Scene
member.returns: A boolean indicator whether the Note has been successfully updated

member.name: M:Watson.Web.Controllers.v1.NoteController.GetAllNotes
member.summary: Gets all notes belonging within a Crime Scene
member.returns: A paginated list with all Notes
